version_description:
Added flares and the laugh cry emoji!
Also added a help button so that you can contact me with any questions or requests!

In the Image Editor, you can now add in your own custom assets and change the text font!
The Warp View now allows you to fine-tune the scale of your effects!
Your images are pulled straight from the Deep Fried folder in your camera roll!

Developer notes:
Realm removed
Instabug (free tier) added
Firebase added for Crashlytics
Core Data added for custom assets
Bug fixes and performance improvements (thanks PHCachingImageManager!)

Bug fixes!
First-time users couldn't save the images to their camera roll the first time they loaded their app (oops)

Developer Notes:
Apple authorization request triggered while I tried creating the PHAssetCollection rendering it nil. Since the first authorization change doesn't restart the app, the PHAssetCollection remained nil. Slipped through testing due to not using any new devices.

You can now delete an image in your Deep Fried folder directly from within the app!
Small UI tweaks!
